title: @Riot can we have a list of champions that in their current state ca not be allowed to be good?
body: I'm specifically talking about the champions that only have two forms, completely useless and Unstoppable monster, like tryndamere and poppy. I'm not really asking for anything in depth if you don't want to talk about it, But I've just been wondering about that list recently, and thinking how these champions could be re integrated into the game without dramatically changing their kits, kind of like what you did for mordekaiser.

replies.body: Ryze comes up every few months.
